detail_desc: Short, fitted dress in stretch velour with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with gathers at one side and long sleeves. Unlined.
Lace thong briefs with an elasticated trim at the top. High cut at the front.
Belt in soft suede that winds around the waist and ties at the front. Width 11 cm.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and hook and loop tab at the back. Waterproof zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts. Shoulder straps with plastic rings that can be tied at the back of the neck and back, and can also be crossed over at the back.
Sandals with crossover straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles with a braided jute trim. Heel approx. 7 cm.

Long parka in airy, rustly nylon with a two-way zip down the front and a hood with an elastic drawstring. Handwarmer pockets at the top, large patch front pockets, an elastic drawstring at the waist and straight cut to the hem. Long sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit. Relaxed fit with long, raglan balloon sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with cutaway coverage at the back.

Longer-style hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a small, embroidered detail on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Metal anklets in different designs. Adjustable length 22-25 cm.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Short T-shirt in soft viscose with a print motif on the front and tie detail at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric. Detachable hood with a faux shearling lining and faux fur trim and a zip down the front with a chin guard and wind flap. Chest pockets with a concealed zip and patch front pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Soft faux shearling lining. The polyester content of the parka is partly recycled.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Three-strand metal necklace with pendants.
Top in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and short sleeves with ribbed, roll edges. Ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Long metal earrings with hoops and thin metal chains. Length 12.5 cm.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in airy, patterned, crinkled chiffon with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Short, wide sleeves with a narrow frill trim at the top, and an elasticated hem. Partly lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and patches on the inside of the legs. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Round-necked T-shirts in stretch cotton jersey.
Flared skirt in cotton chambray with adjustable elastication at the back of the waist, buttons down the front and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in a soft cotton weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and a rounded hem.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with embroidery, a regular waist, zip fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and straight legs.
Blouse in an airy crêpe weave made from partly recycled polyester. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-neck opening with concealed buttons at the front and short, wide raglan sleeves. Lined front.
Short top in an airy cotton weave. Square neckline with a narrow elastication, short, elasticated puff sleeves and elasticated hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, long sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs with a slit. Decorative sparkly stone details at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, and detachable belt at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover top with gentle draping and a seam and sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Cap sleeves, side pockets and gently tapered legs with pleats at the top. Unlined.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap, zip at the top and imitation suede details. Lined. Depth 4 cm. Height 15 cm. Width 23.5 cm.
Long metal necklace with sparkly stones. Adjustable length approx. 52-59 cm.

Set with a top and tulle skirt. Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery print on the front and flared skirt in a double layer of tulle with a partially visible glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the top. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy viscose weave with buttons down the front and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Short dress in a cotton weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and wrapover front and back. Narrow ties that fasten at one side. Lined skirt.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and chunky soles. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 5.5 cm.
Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with an opening and press-stud at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with a rounded hem.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels, buttons at the front and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Non-wired bra top in stretch fabric with a mesh racer back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seamless.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and small opening with ties at the front of the hem.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, an unlined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a high waist, extended waistband with a press-stud and zip fly. Decorative zip at the top, fake back pockets and skinny legs with a zip at the back of the hems.
Knee-length dress in stretch jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck, a wrapover front with ties at one side and short, wide sleeves.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a shimmering metallic print on the front and narrow shoulder straps that join at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long skirt in airy chiffon with a high, elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short jersey underskirt.
V-neck tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Gently tapered waist with a detachable tie belt and a flare to the hem. Unlined.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric made partly from recycled polyester. Hood with an elastic drawstring, a zip down the front, handwarmer and side pockets, both with a concealed zip and a zipped inner pocket. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined and filled with recycled polyester.
Low-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.

Hobo bag in soft suede with matching clutch. Bag with leather handle and tabs with a magnetic fastener at the top. Small, detachable suede clutch with a zip at the top. Unlined. Size approx. 11x31x34 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Two-piece set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with soft elastication at the waist, and overlocked edges at the hems.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a ballerina neckline and short sleeves. Unlined.
Cold shoulder top in a soft viscose weave with an elasticated flounce that goes across the shoulders and an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Skirt in soft leather with a concealed zip at the back. Fitted at the top with seams and a flare to the hem. Lined.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit with 3/4-length puff sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Four pairs of metal ear cuffs, one pair decorated with plastic stones and one with glass rhinestones.
Sandals with narrow, adjustable ankle straps with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Shirt in washed denim with a turn-down collar, classic front and short, cut-off sleeves with frayed edges. Flap chest pockets with a button and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with jersey-lined, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Fancy dress costume with a cape and hat in jersey and a magic wand. Cape with a lightly padded collar and hook and loop fastening at the neck. Lightly padded hat with a contrasting colour band. Lined.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Top in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dungaree dress with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, an open chest pocket and buttons at the sides.
